name: Royal Wedding Quest!-Demo
description:
Royal wedding Quest! is an otome game where your characters goes on a quest to find a husband.

In her country of Fiefagrume, there is an old tradition; young noble women go on a quest to bring home a young noble man to marry in order to take the throne when the old queen needs to retire.

Your character, the current queen's daughter, has to go on a two months long quest accross the country accompanied by a member of each guilds in hope to become the next queen. However, as her adventures progress, a romance might bloom between you and one of your companions…

The game has some fairly unique features:

  • While there is a "True Ending", the game will have various different outcomes depending on your decisions, good and bad.
  • Your character is defined early on in the game and will influence your chances at a romance with some characters, unlock or lock certain choices and change your reactions to some situations.
  • You have two potential rivals, both with their own story arc you will get involved in.
  • You may now customise your character's appearance as well; there's 48 possible different looks for the MC.

The game is still in developpment so more features may appear, and some content in the demo might be subject to change.

UPDATE(28/06/2018): The early access is now available for patreon supporters!
